Articles.Content:
I have a hill.

my hill.

Seagulls come and take you off the hill.

My hill.

The seagulls run into the hill and are stuck

my hill with seagulls in it

Hippies come up and sit around the hill   

Jonathan Livingston hill.

I tell them to get a job and take their Starbucks away.

My hill.

I come and buy the hill for $10

My hill

Anyone gets a mod with hills for free.

Everyone's hill.

Using a speech, I topple your Communist government.

Nobody's hill.

I stand on my hill indifferently to the government.

my hill

People come to hill.  

People's hill.

I take your hill and give it to the hill people.

The Hill people's hill.

People of hill get named Bill.

Hill Bill's hill.

I come and take the hill back.

My hill

Anti-you comes and takes the hill front.

Divided hill.

I sew it back together with 3-0 Silk.

My repaired hill, unified.
You annihilates with anti-you. Hill nebula.

I coalesce the nebula into the planet Genesis, somewhere in the Mutara sector...

My hill on unstable planet.

I take the hill back and the planet explodes.

my hill in space!

I overrun your hill with pigs.

My hill with [Pigs in Space!](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iHsr7Chmff8)

I kill them and take the hill. 

My hill with delicious bacon.

You don't have enough ice to keep the bacon fresh.

Your asteroid of rotten pork.

I make a hill, make it a target for all of my MLRS's, have an army of Marines with GD-10 Multipurpose rifles, Steath Tanks, and push you off your asteroid.

My hill

> 
> 
> 1 hour ago, Joseph Kerman Stalin said:
> 
> 
> I make a hill, make it a target for all of my MLRS's, have an army of Marines with GD-10 Multipurpose rifles, Steath Tanks, and push you off your asteroid.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> My hill
> 

I destroyed that asteroid with antimatter bombs, and took the hill.

My hill, in space.

I peacefully take the hill while you are asleep.

my hill

> 
> 
> 3 hours ago, 53miner53 said:
> 
> 
> I peacefully take the hill while you are asleep.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> my hill
> 

I sneakily take your hill while you are asleep.

My hill
